nodes.title: Reduce churn with ServiceFactory, add configure() method.
Updated versions to be consistent between ostrich and zookeeper-common artifacts
Upgrade to Guava 13.0, simplify pom version references.
Add EnsembleName to support multiple deployments of the same service.
Refactored ZooKeeperServiceRegistry tests, fixed duplicate registration bug
Fixed formatting (lines over 120 characters), unused imports
Updated example pom, to use snapshot version of Ostrich.
updated to match repackaged zookeeper modules
modified service registry to remove dependency on CuratorFramework
Add method to get the ServicePool from a dynamic proxy.
Refactor calculator client to use Dropwizard/Jersey.
Add pool health check that verifies healthy end point (Issue #45)
Updating documentation to reflect recent changes.
Support for checking if exception should be retriable. (Issue #42)
Updated dependency versions in preparation for 1.0 being released.
Support running an operation on all available endpoints (#52)
Support running an operation on all available endpoints (#52)
Update quoting of strings inside of json for ZooKeeperConfigurationTest
Provide statistcs to load balancers and implementations that use them. (Issues #6, #10)
Update poms to right snapshot version.
ConfiguredFixedHostDiscoverySource provides more info to payload serializers.
Add FixedHostDiscovery to use ServicePool without ZooKeeper.
Add ServicePool support for mapping exceptions from one type to another.
Removed direct dependency on zookeeper and added exclusions to curator-recipes
Made Mockito dependency scoped to tests
Use IPs in endpoint payload, host names in endpoint IDs.
Make ServicePool interrupt health checks on close.
Make ServicePool able to handle health checks that throw exceptions.
Minor refactoring of the calculator example
Changes for more robust exception handling (Issue #14)
Made both ServiceRegistry and HostDiscovery closeable (Issues #11 and #12).
Add support for configuring a namespace.
Add HostDiscovery.refresh() method.  Fix race condition in ZKHostDiscovery initialization.
[PD-69262] replace broken long links with labeled
NEX-1338 Add OWASP Dependency Check Plugin
OSTR-166 Improve information surfaced with communications exceptions and logging
OSTR-163 Improve information surfaced with communications exceptions and logging
Updated service pool to only add new node as usable if the node passes an initial healthcheck first.
Fix valid characters to be able to use URL as endpoint names
Always add new nodes to badEndPoint
updated servicePool to add endPoint in bad state by default
Use non-opensource pom for testing release candidate.
updated servicePool to add endPoint in bad state by default
removed ability to compile against specific version of ostrich as it fails to release that way
back-ported multi-threaded service cache changes to 1.7.x branch
Implement MultiThreaded and SingleThreaded service cache
Implement MultiThreaded and SingleThreaded service cache
updated ostrich to 1.7.2-beta with experimental upgrade to commons pool 2.2
Periodically verify that health checks are still being executed
BELL-2454 - updated ostrich to 1.7.2-beta with experimental upgrade to commons pool 2.2
Policy that determines wait time between health check invocations
Refactor MetricRegistry to not be a global singleton
@PartitionKey on inherited methods is no longer ignored.
Make constructor public, but marked deprecated, like it was in Ostrich 1.6.x.
Fix race condition in using an unsynchronized map in ServiceCache
Adding in the standard Apache 2 copyright notice for all *.java files.
Update to use the latest curator-extensions, including the Apache branded curator
Add in more thorough causes for exceptions that happen
Update logging statements in ServicePool to not use string concatenation...
Modify MaxRetriesException to return the last underlying exception.
Eliminate Maven shading errors from examples.
Upgrade SLF4J.  Improve example client config/logging setup.
Fix links to quickstart docs in README.md
Update artifact names to include ostrich in them.
Major updates for the open sourcing effort.
Fixed a resource leak. The HostDiscovery passed to ServicePool by the ServicePoolBuilder might have been created by the builder itself, in which case it should be closed when the pool is closed.
Upgrade to Dropwizard 0.6.1, Metrics 2.2.0, and zookeeper-common 0.1.0.
Add getNumValidEndPoints and getNumBadEndPoints to AsyncServicePool
Update ZooKeeper Common version and moved to version 1.3.0.
updated pom for new zookeeper-common version
update service consumer docs to match current apis
Dropwizard helper for closing dynamic service proxies.
Updated zookeeper-common dependency. Removed direct curator dependency.
SOA bounded exponential backoff retry policy.
Move calculator example sources into distinct packages.
